gr.scriptum.eprotocol.mailclients
Interface MailDaemonMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
MailDaemon
public interface MailDaemonMBean

The MBEan Interface. Always stop and restart the service when you change parameters

Author:
Mike Mountrakis mountrakis@uit.gr
